description:
Arashi is in India, and of course the first thing on his plate is curry. But into the same restaurant walks Shaiva, a dancing star with an incredible appetite. Arashi meets up with Shaiva again near the Ganges River, but an encounter with a cobra puts him and Shaiva is a tight spot! Can Arashi learn that sometimes you have to destroy yourself to overcome your own limits?
Source: crunchyroll
